com.kintone.client

Class SpaceClient

  • Object
    • SpaceClient

  • public class SpaceClient
extends Object
    A client that operates space APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • addGuests

        public void addGuests(List<GuestUser> guests)
        Adds Guest users to kintone. This does not affiliate Guest users with any Guest Spaces, and does not send any invitation emails. To affiliate a Guest user with a Guest Space, follow up this API call with the Update Space Guests API.
        Parameters:
        guests - the list of Guest user data

      • addGuests

        public AddGuestsResponseBody addGuests(AddGuestsRequest request)
        Adds Guest users to kintone. This does not affiliate Guest users with any Guest Spaces, and does not send any invitation emails. To affiliate a Guest user with a Guest Space, follow up this API call with the Update Space Guests API.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See AddGuestsRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See AddGuestsResponseBody

      • addSpaceFromTemplate

        public AddSpaceFromTemplateResponseBody addSpaceFromTemplate(AddSpaceFromTemplateRequest request)
        Creates a Space from a Space template.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See AddSpaceFromTemplateRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See AddSpaceFromTemplateResponseBody

      • addThreadComment

        public long addThreadComment(long spaceId,
                             long threadId,
                             ThreadComment comment)
        Adds a comment to a Thread of a Space.
        Parameters:
        spaceId - the Space ID
        threadId - the Thread ID
        comment - An object including comment details
        Returns:
        the comment ID of the created comment

      • deleteGuests

        public void deleteGuests(List<String> guests)
        Deletes a Guest user from kintone. If you would like to remove a user from a Guest Space without deleting their account, use the Update Guest Members API.
        Parameters:
        guests - a list of email addresses of Guest users

      • deleteGuests

        public DeleteGuestsResponseBody deleteGuests(DeleteGuestsRequest request)
        Deletes a Guest user from kintone. If you would like to remove a user from a Guest Space without deleting their account, use the Update Guest Members API.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See DeleteGuestsRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See DeleteGuestsResponseBody

      • getSpaceMembers

        public List<AddedSpaceMember> getSpaceMembers(long spaceId)
        Gets the list of Space members of a Space.
        Parameters:
        spaceId - the Space ID
        Returns:
        a list of Space members. Guest users, inactive users and deleted users will not be included.
